titleStmt.title: The goodli history of the moste noble and beautyfull Ladye Lucres of Scene in Tuskane, and of her louer Eurialus verye pleasaunt and delectablevnto ye reder
De duobus amantibus Eurialo et Lucrecia. English
titleStmt.author: Pius, II, Pope, 1404-1464.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
